title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 248-2.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 248-2.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) General. This

Part applies to all heavy duty vehicles except for: (1)
locomotives; (2)
alternative fuel vehicles; (3)
any HDV subject to a lease or contract
entered into or last renewed prior to February 12, 2007; and
(4)
any on road vehicle with engine model
years prior to 1960. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
248-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
